MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL54 postcode area of Trefor. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  2.50PM. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.14PM on 12th February 2021
